title: UK cyber security : total market size 2010 to 2017
summary: In general Market size in million GBP has rose over the Year.
Market size in million GBP is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum Market size in million GBP, about 3489.0 was reported at Year 2017
The lowest Market size in million GBP, of value 2796.0 was reported at Year 2013
